output: Katy, you don't know.
I quietly obtained a marriage certificate with Little Red.
Xiao Hong
Yes, indeed.
You are unaware of this matter.

Last time, you brought Katy over for someone's birthday, and then I also brought her along, which is how they met. They had a meal together, and I don't quite know how they ended up together after that.
Yes, indeed.

I didn't know about this matter, and that day Katy sent me a photo. When I saw it, I thought it was a marriage certificate that had been approved. I really thought it was approved, but to my surprise, upon closer inspection, it was real—the two of them actually got their marriage license. I was taken aback.
Simply put, bringing people here under those conditions is not bad, right? KT also took a liking to two people and they hit it off well, their energies aligning suitably.
If you truly aren't bothered, don't look at the kind of thing where I tell you that someone's face is truly suitable for you to carefully discover.
In fact, it's quite appropriate. Let's bless them both.
I haven't been in touch with Kitty for a long time. How has he been recently?
They obtained their marriage certificate.
Impossible! How could this be? How could there be a ten-year age gap between them? How could they be together?
Oh, just that day.
The two of them started talking again.
It's too incredible. Who is chasing whom?
The difference in age here is due to the reason of his parents' background.
Oh, you really are love's fool, regardless of age.
What does "compatibility" mean? Their personalities don't match either.
Oh, all the Buddhas, all the Buddhas.
I'm afraid I wouldn't feel right about arranging a private meeting between the two of them right now.
You don't know.
Quietly leave
Some people got married without us knowing, or perhaps I secretly knew but didn't say anything. Now they've divorced, and I either knew about it secretly or heard it from others.

How was I to know that at that time, KT thought the conditions were quite good, but after spending half a day together, they realized that the two of them didn't see eye to eye and their personalities didn't match, which should be the reason.
I also don't know.

It wasn't mainly about that at the time, was it? Didn't you say then that you thought they weren't suitable for each other? I actually thought they were quite compatible. Now, indeed, you said they weren't suitable.
I thought it was you who arranged it, not me.
I thought you were the one arranging it. Could it be that you weren't? So they knew each other and were together at that time?
Oh, in that case, let's not eat with the group. Let's arrange a separate meeting to see and ask about the situation.
Let's talk about it again later.
Well, why don't we invite KD and his wife out for a meal together these next few days?
It's not that you don't have a good relationship with him. Why not give him a call? I can arrange a meeting tomorrow without needing to invite anyone else.
What's wrong?
What has left?
It hasn't been long since they got married this time.
It is not that you got married quickly and divorced quickly for no reason.
How could they get married back then when they didn't even match up?
There must be a reason for this.
At that time, I thought their age difference was a barrier to any potential outcome. I never imagined that he would get married just over a month ago.
I made a mistake in marrying him. He is not the right age for me; we are more than ten years apart. We have been married for over a month and are already considering divorce.
Back then, when I knew you had a good relationship with her, didn't I ask you about everything?
It seems challenging to arrange a one-on-one meeting, doesn't it?
It's not that I, Little Red, haven't said to you to find a place closer to the subway. Yours is three kilometers from the subway; it's not convenient for me to commute to work like that.
It's not you, it's the morning sun. You see how big other people's windows are, but look at this window, it's just this big. Morning sun, I'll just cast my eyes towards the morning sun.
Isn't this not a strict requirement? I want to live in a better place. The walls are all messed up, and there are strange smells. Can't you help me look for other houses?
You are wrong to speak to me like this. I am paying you to assist me, so please just find a way to help me.

I can definitely afford a good place. Why don't you help me look around? There are so many options in the surrounding areas. If you insist on this particular neighborhood, it seems your abilities are limited to finding me a house here.
Aren't you able to smell it? The strong formaldehyde odor is overwhelming. If I enter, I might get sick. Who will be responsible if I fall ill?
Let's sign a contract. Whenever I fall ill, you shall send me to receive treatment at your expense.
Alright, alright, I guess your abilities are just about average. It is what it is.
You see this room; it's a newly available room over here.

It's not that he is the main focus, but currently, housing is particularly tight, and this room is also quite good. You see, the environment is excellent, the window faces the sun, and these all meet your requirements, right?
A window will suffice. You're living alone, not in some grand place.
Furthermore, as you can see, the bathroom is equipped with all the necessities. This room has a washing machine and a refrigerator. Look at this fridge.
It's not that I'm telling you this, but if I have to deal with these few clients of yours every month, I'd be annoyed myself. You know?

You said you wanted something cheaper, so I found you some cheaper options. You said it was difficult to find something suitable, but now you're saying this isn't right or that isn't right. You're just nitpicking.
If you really have the means to own this house, it would be quite an accomplishment to be able to live in it.

But you see, I've found you a place near the subway, but the price is high and it's not suitable for you. If I find a place further away, you complain about the small space. How about a campervan? It's spacious and white.

Don't take this the wrong way, but what you're asking is challenging because the original Chinese text contains colloquialisms, incomplete sentences, and a strong emotional tone. Here's a faithful translation that attempts to preserve the meaning and nuances:

"You shouldn't hold this against me, but this is because it's freshly painted where you're talking about, and it has no smell yet. You're really setting the bar too high. You say you really want this, but if I have a client like you every month, I won't rent out, I won't rent out."
Xiaogang came by to take a look and see how things are.
Is it not possible?
It's a fine day, with the morning sun shining brightly.
It's not that we weren't chatting online before and you said you wanted to rent, but now you're starting to nitpick. What's with that?
Earth algae, oh!
You need to rent, I'll find someone to clean it up for you in advance. Just take a look and see if this floor plan will work for you. You really don't need to say so much.
It's not that I, as the host, have designed it this way. If it's not workable for you, I can repaint it white. If you prefer it black, I can paint it black. I'm not saying...
How nice! You haven't spent any money on this brand in ten years.
Xiaogang, I've noticed that you tend to complicate things. We can discuss this online, and I'll point out that this issue isn't really about me.
Quite good.
These are all our family's antiques. You can't just discard our family's antiques. You've already agreed that when you come in and out, you'll use our things.
Then as for the water faucet that's gushing out, you really should try it yourself and see how your water faucet is.

Let me put it this way to you. This entire building is now mine. See this key in my hand? I have keys to all the units, but based on your budget, this is the only suitable one. You can rent it or not, it's up to you. If you don't want it, someone else will.
Grandmother, please leave quickly. Who said this?
It's not just about this house.
I said to the landlady, "You see, these windows..."
The morning sun is too weak; as a man, he has certain hobbies and preferences. The ventilation is not good either.
In that case, you can mention it later. Look at the ground.
This is a place where no one lives, but when you step inside, the air is thick and heavy, emanating a scent that defies description.

It's not that I'm speaking, but from my first impression, I feel it's not good. You look at the surface, one side is white, the other side is black. When you say you scrape it and it turns white, do you know that the scraping will affect the cloud a little?
I'm not saying, big sister, but hasn't it been about ten years since you got this refrigerator?
Although it is a famous brand, as you can see, there is an extra ingredient inside that cannot be used.
This is not my responsibility. Look at the washing machine, please.
How can we use this, as it's all rusted?
Using your things, I said I can't use them. Looking at these things, they seem unusable. Can I take a shower? Is there a way to shower here?
You wash what I've already washed; there's no need to wash it again. Look at the showerhead; it has a shower roller, but the showerhead itself is not included.

Oh, to tell the truth, dear elder sister, could you help me find a place where the cost is roughly the same, and I can manage it myself? At least the environment there has good air quality and is pleasant.
Alright, alright, I won't rent it, I won't rent it.
"Why not? If I'm thirty, is it so bad to be in a relationship? Dad, are you implying that I'm too old? What's wrong with being thirty and single? Isn't that quite alright?"
No, no, no, Dad. If you can't raise me, it's your choice. Don't raise me then. I'm old enough.

Your age is not something that directly concerns me. You didn't choose to raise me out of willingness, did you? I am thirty now, and I am managing well on my own. If you say I should find someone who loves me, what if I find someone who doesn't reciprocate my feelings? Will you take responsibility for that? Will you find someone for me?
I prefer people who don't like me; I'm not saying I've never liked anyone. If others don't appreciate me, don't try to force it on me.
I just don't want to date, I'll talk about cotton instead. Talking about cotton can earn money too.
Are you sure? My current salary can support both of us. It would be great for the two women to live together. Let's do it together, there's no problem.

You just say that you dislike the idea of me finding a partner and us not being able to live together. You ask how I will take care of you when we're old if that's the case. You say that things are good between us now, that we're both single. Isn't that true?
I didn't get angry with you. It's just that you feel I've been angry with you. When did I ever get angry with you? It's really boring.
You say you're already in your early thirties, and I can't help but wonder when you'll start dating.
For many years, I've been managing well on my own. After your mother's passing, I've been solely responsible for your every need, from feeding and clothing you to raising you on my own.
All I hope for my daughter is that you can find a man who loves you and whom you love in return. I beg you, can you find a partner?
I am getting older.
So you won't look for one that you like?
Don't give me that useless talk. If you really don't want to date, then don't date. Why are you talking about cotton instead?
In your early thirties now, daughter, if you don't start dating, do you really want to be supported by Dad for the rest of your life?
I really want to tell you, having a daughter like you could literally kill me.
Alright, I'll give you an ultimatum: you must bring me a son-in-law this year.
Dad, you sneaked a peek at my phone.
I don't care about this dad, my phone, or what I said before. I told you not to snoop on me again. I'm not a child anymore; I'm about to become an adult. I deserve some privacy. How old are you?

Why isn't my mind focused on studying? I'm currently in the top ten of my grade; haven't I kept up with you? What am I doing now? There's no need for you to come and understand this; it's meaningless. All I need to do now is ensure that you study well.

I think you have no right to tell me what to do. I'm grown up now. If you continue to do this, I don't know what else to say. Next time, don't even look at my phone. I won't let you discover what I chat about on my phone again.
I am not afraid of your father; it's just that...
I'm not angry with you; it's just that you choose to feel that way. I'm telling you this for your own good.
On what grounds was it confiscated?

It's not that you said, when you bought this phone for me, that I would take care of it and use it myself. Now, you want to take it away from me. How am I supposed to contact anyone when I go to school or when I go home? You're making me lose it. Now you want to leave?
I have not fallen in love with you, but if you feel that I have, just look at those two words and you'll think I'm in early love.
I am 16 years old, which is quite grown-up now.
Did I say I'm in a relationship? I didn't say that, did I? It's you who thinks so.
It's not that we young people speak like this; if you can't adapt, don't adapt. We just speak like this.
What does it mean? If you dare, go ahead and hit me, dad.
Please explain to me who this male chat partner is in our phone conversations.
I am your father; can I not take a look? I am asking you if you are dating someone.
When you turn 18 and are considered an adult, I'll tell you this: In our rural area, if you're a boy, you can start dating, and your father would be able to bear it.
Don't forget that you're a girl, do you understand? You're a girl, and you've already fallen in love with high school. Daughter, you're in high school now. You should focus your thoughts on studying.

Are you feeling confident or are you showing off your knowledge?

(Note: This is a literal translation. The phrase "你拍你心大呀" is colloquial and can be interpreted in different ways depending on context. It could also mean "Do you think you're so smart?" or "Are you trying to prove something?")
You're simply trying to provoke me, aren't you?
You must understand that I am telling you that your phone will be confiscated starting this year.
Why should I, with my hands and my identity as your father, [be expected to do this]?
Is it clear that this is precocious love? Your thoughts are not focused on your studies.
You are only 16 years old this year, my daughter.
Start dating now.
The chat log portrays such a pitiful scene. Where are you all, you elementary school students? At your young age, where did you learn such behavior?
Furthermore, I will strike you if you say that again.
I have nothing more to say to you. Let's wait until your mother comes back and then we'll talk.
Dad, what do you mean? Please explain it to me, and I'll understand everything.
I call Auntie Xiaohong "Auntie" just like I would refer to myself. So, you want me to call her "Auntie" based on our zodiac signs?
Go ahead, don't call her Auntie Xiaohongya, just call her Xiaohong. I appreciate it, Dad, I really can't take it anymore.
When did you say you were getting married? Dad, if you're talking about dating, I can turn a blind eye to it. But now that you mention marriage, what do you mean by that?
That was between me and Wang Yue.
Well, since Xiaohong hasn't called me either, and we haven't been in contact, why don't you ask Xiaohong to come over?
Let's stop. You're married to him now, Little Red. Aunt Red has become Mom. Can I call her Mom Red?
Do you think it's okay? Can you bear it yourself? I am the same age as Little Red, and then I call her mom. Isn't that uncomfortable for you?

What's wrong with Xiaohong? Don't make me call her 'Mom', whatever you do. Don't make me call her 'Mom', okay? If you're dating her, I won't say anything, but if you want to marry her, let me tell you, it's a no from me.
Do you know why not? If you want to marry him, he has to divide the property with me.
As for now, I have only one child. If you add his name to the household registration at home, I will tell you that I will sever my father-daughter relationship with you. I am telling you this.
"If you let him into our home, I will absolutely cut off all ties with you. I'm not lying to you."
Just don't let that little red, whether it's Little Red's mom or Auntie Red, talk nonsense. I'm telling you, just make her leave. Just make sure I don't find out and see her.
Not Dad, haha. This time, it's Auntie Xiaohong. It's been over a year since she passed away.
You are also aware of the relationship between me and your Aunt Xiaohong.
You are refusing to agree to our marriage, aren't you?

I've wasted my efforts raising you as my daughter. Father, your heart is as cold as bitter medicine. After you left with your mother to live apart from me for so many years, has your mother ever called you?
Has anyone ever cared for you, bought things for you? It's all your father, me.

My partner Xiaohong and I are preparing to get married immediately. I want to discuss this with you; if you agree, Xiaohong will become your stepmother. Whatever way I cherish you, Xiaohong will be able to cherish you the same way.
You are severing ties with women.

This phrase literally translates to "It's killing me with anger" or "I'm so angry I could die." A more idiomatic expression in English would be:

**I'm absolutely fuming.**
What's going on?
It seems I know what happened.
Just tell me directly, don't shout at me like this.

Aunt Lan, formerly my close friend, is now addressed as "Auntie" at her request. If the two of you are getting married, should I start calling her "Mom"? What are you implying, Dad? Do I still have a daughter in your eyes?
It's not that the blue one has brainwashed you; you took a liking to it the very day you came to our place.
I'm saying, that's why he insisted on coming to my place that day. It's because, now that you're earning some money, he just won't stop trying to better his position.

I've seen through him, Dad. Don't say anything else. Lanlan is not in a good state of mind right now. You should hurry up and get her to leave. If she ever steps into our house, I'm telling you, I won't have a single share of the property.
So why did you, being alone, specifically look for Lanlan among others? I don't understand. How is it that I give Lanlan to you?
It has been over a year, hasn't it?
Not his father, and only half a year ago did I call him 'you.' So, you're saying the two of you were already together before that? I didn't know. I thought I was doing fine.
If you, Dad, allow him to step into our home even for a day, I will sever my father-daughter relationship with you.
You figure it out. Anyway, it's like this now - whether he's there or not, I'm there or not, you decide for yourself.

"Nü'er wants to discuss something with you."

(Note: "妞儿" (Nü'er) is a diminutive or affectionate term for "girl" or "young woman" in Chinese, often used in informal or friendly contexts. The phrase "给你商量个事" translates to "wants to discuss something with you.")
Is it really beyond you to give Dad a smile?
Just say it directly.
I plan to discuss with Auntie and seek her permission for the two of us to proceed with this matter.
Isn't it you who is my father?

I have been with my grandmother for over a year now. What's wrong with that?
So I'll call you Aunt Lan from now on, won't I?
So now you know.
What, this is the father-daughter relationship?
Learning, indeed.
What am I doing now, Master?
"Why do you say I haven't studied properly? I'm hanging in there. Didn't you even praise me before?"
You compliment my carving skills, and I shall reveal a secret to you.
No, no, no, no, no, Master. Look, I feel like you're almost like my dad now, even more so than my dad. You know, right?

My hand has been learning that, didn't you notice we can't sell it? If we can't sell it, that means what? No money to be made. If there's no money to be made, then what have I carved? I'm carving something innovative now, and you're saying I'm wrong again.
However, customers seem to find my innovative product quite satisfactory.
I am indeed teaching you.
But the sales are good, you're making money, right? You can't even pay the rent, so you're not letting me have a hit?

Not the master, not. I asked you, with your old-fashioned thinking, how many of your carvings can you sell now? Tell me, do you sell one a month? Have you sold any of those carvings, master? This month, I carved ten and sold nine.

Why are you still clinging to these old ideas? Can't you be a bit more open-minded? If I can sell this for money, it proves that our innovation is useful. My intricate designs have meaning; they are significant. If customers want to buy from us, our store can expand and grow.
They really want to see my face, they will buy your embroidered items. Why buy mine? Because they can use mine as gifts. Yours can't be given away.
Not the master.
I have not.
Without a master.
I apologize to you, Master.
You say you're arranging what on your broken phone every day? Have you learned this engraving technique or not?
Have you studied?

I am praising you, truly I am praising you. 
(Note: The repetition of "you" in the original Chinese text is maintained in the translation to preserve the emphasis and tone.)
Let me tell you, being as young as you are, everything I entrust to you is from my own youth. Back then, many people sought me out to engage in self-abasement.
You are sitting there as if you are doing a favor for your grandfather.
Are you here to learn a trade or to act as the boss?
What object did you strike?
Did I teach you like this? Is this how I taught you?
Let me tell you, I'm only saying this because I consider your father a good friend. I'm advising you, if you continue like this, you can go home and act like a young master there.
I will not accept you as my disciple if you act like a little girl.
What you're selling are all to your classmates and good friends, who are doing you a favor, get it? It's not like you're selling to strangers. Take a good look at what you're really peddling here.

Do you feel that you are full now, don't you?

Is it that you want to fly?
If you go home tomorrow and act like a young master, I won't accept you as my apprentice.
Just now, you saw a glass walkway over there; let's go in that direction.

This is not something to be sold, no. Brother Gang, I paid for you to come here. Last time, you helped me so much. I said I'd take you to play something very fun, very exciting. Didn't you agree at the time? Look, it's so good. Go ahead and get on the previous ride.
It's not that you're looking down, it's that you're relaxing as you look down. How stimulating! Look, the small animals below are even waving at you. Look, tilt your head down just a bit more.
You see, if you had taken one more step slowly, nothing would have happened, truly nothing. But watching it was terrifying.

Come, let me pull you.
Come, let me pull you.

Come

Just take a step forward, don't look down, otherwise, you'll be staring at me, fixated on me. Come on, take a step, one, two, three.
Are you okay? You've lifted one leg up, now lift the other. Step forward together, one, two. Don't look down. Why did you cry out? Never mind, get up, get up, get up.

No problem, watch me, we'll walk over. We can't go back, do you understand? Big brother, we absolutely cannot go back now. Once you step onto this path, there's no turning back. You can only proceed, so don't be afraid.
Don't worry, when I say run, follow my lead and run forward. Keep up the pace.
